elem.name: countryCode
elem.descr: This is the two-character ISO country code (as used in toplevel domains). For Germany use "DE".

elem.name: maxLenOurName
elem.descr: Maximum length of the issuer name.

elem.name: maxLenOtherName
elem.descr: Maximum length of the recipients name.

elem.name: maxLenPurpose
elem.descr: Maximum length of the purpose line.

elem.name: maxPurposeLines
elem.descr: Maximum length of the purpose line.

elem.name: limitLocalValue
elem.descr: Optional limit for a transfer in local currency.

elem.name: limitForeignValue
elem.descr: Optional limit for a transfer in foreign currency.
